definitions.definition: how food or drink tastes, or a particular taste itself:
examples: Add a little salt to bring out the flavour of the herbs.
The resort has a nautical flavour.

definitions.definition: an idea or quick experience of something:
examples: To give you a flavour of what the book is like Jilly is going to read out a brief extract.

definitions.definition: to give a particular taste to food or drink:
examples: This sauce is flavoured with garlic and herbs.
